channel.title: Blood On Satan's Claw
channel.desc: In 18th-century England, a farmer finds a deformed skull, sparking a sinister influence over the village's youth, who fall under the grip of a demonic force. Folk horror classic.

channel.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Lee and Flo are in Winchester to design a magical woodland garden for Rhiannon, Chris and their daughter Seren.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Ed Baines and Valentine Warner visit and compete in country shows. The chefs both hope to win the day with their date and walnut scones at the Nidderdale show.

channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: DIY expert Dave Wellman visits a couple in Southampton, who have an unfinished bathroom and building site for a home. 1/20.

channel.title: New Home DIY

channel.title: New Home DIY

channel.title: New Home DIY

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Water Babies
channel.desc: A young chimney sweep falsely accused of theft escapes into a river, entering a magical animated underwater world where he helps free captive Water Babies. A British classic.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: What's Good For The Goose
channel.desc: Comedy. Norman Wisdom stars as a bank manager who upends his square existence to join some youthful hippies. Will this new groovy energy bring the spark back to his marriage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Commandos
channel.desc: Action. During World War II, a commando outfit disguised as an Italian Army unit is parachuted behind Axis lines. Lee Van Cleef stars.
